name: Matchy Dice
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2022 Theme: Roll of the Dice.

Match 3 dice of the same value.

Swap dice by clicking and dragging left or right  (not up or down).

Black dice can't be swapped.

Press the "Roll Dice" button to give black dice a new random value.

See how many points you can get before dice reach the top!

Not yet mobile friendly :(
